0.user_question: Axel has 50 silver pesos and 8494515 gold pesos. He visits her friend Anna who has twice as many silver pesos as he has and 40 more gold pesos. What's the total number of pesos they have together?

1.subquestion: How many silver pesos do both friends combined possess?

subanswer.text: Both friends combine their silver pesos; hence if Anna has double what Axel owns (which amounts to 50 x 2), then she possesses 100 silver pesos plus the initial 50 owned by Axel, making up to 100 + 50 = 150 silver pesos altogether. Answer 150.
